task: Scrape https://docs.github.com/en/rest?apiVersion=2022-11-28 and create a comprehensive sitemap of discovered links. Find ALL links in the sidebar/menu that lead to API endpoint usage Documentation. Process the site systematically: 1. Extract all navigation links from sidebar/menu structures 2. Categorize links by API sections (authentication, endpoints, webhooks, etc.) 3. Prioritize links containing keywords: 'api', 'endpoint', 'reference', 'guide', 'authentication' 4. Focus on links from the sidebar or menu and avoid links in the main content section 5. Avoid external links but include all internal documentation paths 6. Create a hierarchical structure showing parent-child relationships between documentation sections
